climatePledgeFriendly.details: ECOLOGO certified products meet standards that can reduce the environmental impact of one or more stages of the product lifecycle.

features: Large inter-folded dispenser napkins that are perfect for self-service restaurants.
Help prevent spread with our well-covered napkin dispensers—guests only touch the napkins they use.
Napkins stay clean thanks to a paper package that encloses the napkin and improves hygiene.
Improve cost in use for napkins with a one-at-a-time dispensing system that reduces consumption.
12 packs, 500 napkins each. 1 ply. Advanced quality. Folded size L 4.3" W 6.5" Unfolded size L 8.5" W 13.0" Compatible with N4 dispensers.
body.description: Tork Xpressnap® White Dispenser Napkin N4: Napkin waste can drive up costs for your business, but one-at-a-time dispensing with the Tork Advanced Plus Xpressnap® means guests touch only the napkin they use, which improves hygiene while reducing overconsumption. You'll also avoid damaged napkins with paper packaging that protects them in transit and storage. The strength, absorbency, durability and quality of these 2-ply dispenser napkins provide an improved guest experience and lower costs for you. Advantages at a glance: + Protective packaging + 100% recycled, + 40% post-consumer fibers + ECOLOGO certified + EPA compliant, + Certified compostable + Tork Easy Handling® Carrying Box Compatible with Tork N4 dispensers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A global brand Tork is our global brand of professional hygiene solutions for businesses and one of the many brands that make up the Essity umbrella. 90+ markets globally One of the top Global professional hygiene brands How Tork helps you get ready for business The Tork Xpressnap system helps you reduce napkin consumption, promote your marketing messages, and minimize environmental impact, allowing you to focus on what’s most important to your business: providing an excellent guest experience. We know you face business challenges each and every day We deliver the products that take care of your professional hygiene needs We save you time, money and effort, so you can stay focused on your business

Tork Foodservice Essentials Minimize Waste Tork Xpressnap is North America’s best-selling line of napkin dispensers because it reduces napkin usage by at least 25%! That means fewer refills and lower labor costs; better hygiene for customers; and a smaller footprint for the environment. Reduce Consumption, Reduce Costs Tork’s patented 'One Napkin, Every Time' dispensing reduces napkin consumption. By better controlling what’s dispensed, customers can get what they need while you can reduce waste and extra costs. Boost Your Business AD-a-Glance display panels present a marketing window of opportunity—use them to promote products, boost your brand or sell ad space. Design your own AD-a-Glance dispenser display easily online.

Tork Xpress Napkin Dispenser Tork Extra Soft Xpressnap Dispenser Napkin Tork Xpressnap Dispenser Napkin, Interfold Tork Xpressnap Café Dispenser Napkin, Interfold Tork Xpressnap to Go Portable Napkin Pack, Interfold, 1/4 Fold Product Tork Xpressnap Tabletop Napkin Dispenser Tork Extra Soft Xpressnap Dispenser Napkin, Interfold Tork Xpressnap Dispenser Napkin, Interfold Tork Xpressnap Café Dispenser Napkin, Interfold Tork Xpressnap to Go Portable Napkin Pack, Interfold, 1/4 Fold Quality Premium Universal Advanced Color Black White Natural White White Features 2-Ply 1-Ply 1-Ply 1-Ply Size 6.1" Height x 7.9" Width x 5.9" Diameter 8.5" Length x 13.0" Width 8.5" Length x 13.0" Width 8.5" Length x 8.5" Width 8.5" Length x 13.0" Width Case Pack Case of 4 Dispensers Case of 8 Packs, 500 per Pack, 4,000 Napkins Case of 12 Packs, 500 per Pack, 6,000 Napkins Case of 12 Packs, 500 per Pack, 6,000 Napkins Case of 36 Packs, 136 per Pack, 4,896 Napkins

Tork - Hygiene Solutions Tork inspires you to think ahead so you can meet the highest hygiene expectations and optimize your business performance. Hygiene for all: We are dedicated to raising hygiene standards for the majority of users. Tork is committed to developing innovative hygiene solutions that are better for business and the planet. Tork Vision Cleaning uses the power of real-time data to ensure dispensers are stocked. Tork connected dispensers and people counters, monitor supply levels and visitor traffic in your facility so you can target cleaning and refilling, where and when it's needed most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These napkins worked very well for being one-ply. These absorb pretty well. also they were never meant to be soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work as advertised
reviews.reviewText: They fit my Tork dispenser, which is very convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A bit pricey but no other alternatives
reviews.reviewText: We love our Tork dispensers. I believe these are too pricey but there are honestly no other alternatives we've found that will work as well in the dispensers, so I continue to purchase them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Resource for a Festival
reviews.reviewText: I have the upright Tork Napkin dispenser that can dispense 1,000 napkins. This makes it easier for the festival attendees and the volunteers working in the food booths. Single-ply tends to tear, but more than one napkin can be removed slowly with patience. It prevents people from "thoughtlessly" grabbing a handful of napkins at once and throwing away more than necessary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the dinner table
reviews.reviewText: I spent a few years watching my wife (after preparing a wonderful meal) finally get to sit down to eat, only to have a child ask for a napkin and the napkin holder was empty. I bought her the Torx napkin dispenser and this box of 6000 napkins and now it only needs refilling once every month or so. This box lasted our family of 4 more than 3 and 1/2 years!!! Not to mention, my wife didn't have to get up every other meal to get more napkins. And she doesn't have to buy napkins when she gets groceries. She loves it. I liked doing something small to make her life easier. And the napkins work just fine at getting stuff off your face or hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans you up
reviews.reviewText: What can I say, they're napkins, they'll get food off your face. I use it because I like the Tork dispensers, I don't know if I love the price, but even though they cost more, the customers take fewer and waste them rather than if you just had ones that were easy to grab a stack of. So you'll probably come out the same in napkin expenses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great napkins, great value happy customers
reviews.reviewText: I have not had a single customer complain and these along with the matching dispenser has saved my company so much money and myself time not having to replenish so many napkins. The napkins are a great quality and easy to load in the matching dispenser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Messy eaters: unite!!!
reviews.reviewText: These napkins are great! I keep the dispenser full on my table. So very handy to use! They are smaller napkins, but with the low cost and volume, I just use as many as I need to get the job done!

reviews.reviewTitle: Exactly what I was looking for!
reviews.reviewText: I will have napkins for a very long time, but that’s OK!

we hv tork xpress. we like it so much that we gave it as a gift toother people. i like it cz now i eont hv to buy individual tissues. saves money and time. refilling is fast but sadly this breaks much faster ofcourse. we now buy this always. but they keep on raising up the price. i might need to find something else in the future.
